title: Asesino del Olvido
overview: When the retired police officer Pascual Le√≥n is diagnosed with Alzheimer's and faces memory loss, he finds the perfect excuse to settle an old account that has plagued him for years. Jimena, a young policewoman, is assigned the biggest case in her career, which will test her ability to remember to discover the truth. Both will cross paths and lines that they never thought they were willing to cross.
